name: Welcome to Beaksville
description:
Welcome to Beaksville!

Our city has a problem with massive numbers of pigeons landing on our power lines and causing power outages throughout the town.

It is your job to scare them away before they get a chance to land on the power lines and cause any significant damage. The more birds you scare away, the more will come. Some birds take a few times to scare away, so keep scaring away. How long will you last? Only time will tell. Good Luck!

Tap away at birds as they fly towards the power line. Larger birds require more taps to get rid of.

Play in fullscreen!
